mapper.select: /* schedule.getUserList */ SELECT T.SP_CSTM_ID ,T.USER_ID ,T.USER_NM ,T.USER_DESC ,T.E_MAIL ,T.PHONE_NUM ,T.STATE ,GET_CODE_NM('USER_STATE', T.STATE) AS STATE_NM ,T.UPDATE_USER ,TO_CHAR( T.UPDATE_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) UPDATE_DATE ,A.ROLE_ID ,R.ROLE_NM ,R.ROLE_DESC ,T.USE_YN ,T.DEL_YN ,T.SURETY_INSURANCE ,T.GENDER ,T.SALES_TYPE ,GET_CODE_NM('SALES_TYPE', SALES_TYPE) AS SALES_TYPE_NM ,T.RECOMMENDER_ID ,GET_CODE_NM('USER_ID', RECOMMENDER_ID) AS RECOMMENDER_NM FROM TBL_EXP_USER T ,TBL_EXP_AUTH A ,TBL_EXP_ROLE R WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.SP_CSTM_ID = A.SP_CSTM_ID AND T.SP_CSTM_ID = R.SP_CSTM_ID AND T.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND R.ROLE_ID = A.ROLE_ID AND T.USER_ID IN ('windrider','jonsaram','trigger11kr','51115125782')

/* schedule.scheduleDuplicationCheck */ WITH SCHEDULE AS ( SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')||START_TIME_HOUR||':'||START_TIME_MINUTE||':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATE ,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')||END_TIME_HOUR||':'||END_TIME_MINUTE||':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} AND SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE ) SELECT SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE ,SCHEDULE.START_DATE ,SCHEDULE.END_DATE FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATE ,TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATE FROM DUAL ) CHECK_DATA ,SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( CHECK_DATA.START_DATE BETWEEN SCHEDULE.START_DATE AND SCHEDULE.END_DATE OR CHECK_DATA.END_DATE BETWEEN SCHEDULE.START_DATE AND SCHEDULE.END_DATE ) OR ( SCHEDULE.START_DATE BETWEEN CHECK_DATA.START_DATE AND CHECK_DATA.END_DATE OR SCHEDULE.END_DATE BETWEEN CHECK_DATA.START_DATE AND CHECK_DATA.END_DATE ) ORDER BY SCHEDULE.START_DATE

/* schedule.getScheduleMasterList */ SELECT SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_MASTER A WHERE 1 = 1
AND SCHEDULE_GRP_ID = #{scheduleGrpId}

/* schedule.getScheduleShareList */ SELECT A.SP_CSTM_ID ,A.USER_ID ,B.USER_NM ,A.SCHEDULE_ID ,B.DEL_YN ,B.E_MAIL ,B.GRADE ,B.PHONE_NUM ,B.SP_CSTM_ID ,B.STATE ,B.UPDATE_DATE ,B.UPDATE_USER ,B.USER_DESC ,B.USE_YN FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_SHARE A JOIN TBL_EXP_USER B ON 1 = 1 AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = B.SP_CSTM_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
